subject: Ethics
title: The Ad Tech Tracking Ecosystem
description: A quick win: understand The Ad Tech Tracking Ecosystem.

hook.text: You search for running shoes once. Shoe ads follow you for weeks across every site. That's not luck â€” it's an industry.

buildup.text: When you visit a website, dozens of hidden trackers fire. Each reports to a different ad company in milliseconds.

discovery.text: Real-time bidding auctions happen in 100 milliseconds. Advertisers bid on your attention using your profile.

twist.text: Your browsing history travels to hundreds of companies per day. A single news site can have 70+ hidden trackers.

climax.text: You're not the customer of free websites. You're the product being auctioned thousands of times a day.

punchline.text: Free apps aren't free. You pay with your data profile.

quiz.question: What happens during real-time bidding in ad tech?
options: Users choose which ads to see
Advertisers auction for your attention in milliseconds
